name: Gunship Helicopter Battle 3
description:
Gunship Helicopter Battle 3:
Lets enjoy finally another best battle fan developed game based on the flying and fighting hero. You can help the super warrior to clash who is fighting against the waves of enemies in jungle and on the road from fantasy world dimension in the space. There is a man with sward and gun the full power of the mighty warrior kills the enemy. The super hero can attack and destroy your opponents at very much high speed. The final destination of this fighter depends upon you and don't forget that he is far stronger than a Soldier, Ninja, Knight or any other best fighter in the world. A wonderful adventure is waiting for you to enjoy the weekend. The surprise of the best fighter game has revealed and know your dream has come true finally.
It has the following features:
You can enjoy 3D flight with terrific controls
It lets you chose from a wide range of gun and swards
Arm your super hero with a variety of updated weapons & equipment.

- It is fully challenging game that makes you feel difficulties with the next mission.
